select u.id, u.contractNO, u.customerID,f.customerName,u.loadingPointID, g.linesName as loadingPoint, u.unloadingPointID,h.linesName as unloadingPoint, u.freight,u.taxYN from mccdesign.dbo.t_logistics_contract u left join mccdesign.dbo.t_logistics_dossier_customer f on u.customerID = f.id left join mccdesign.dbo.t_logistics_dossier_lines g on u.loadingPointID = g.id left join mccdesign.dbo.t_logistics_dossier_lines h on u.unloadingPointID = h.id where 1=1
and contractNO like '%${contractNO}%'
and f.customerName like '%${customerName}%'
and g.linesName like '%${loadingPoint}%'
and h.linesName like '%${unloadingPoint}%'
and u.freight = '${freight}'
and u.taxYN = '${taxYN}'
order by contractNO desc

select u.id,u.customerID,(u.contractNO+'('+f.customerName+')') as contractNO, u.loadingPointID,u.unloadingPointID,u.freight,u.taxYN from mccdesign.dbo.t_logistics_contract u left join mccdesign.dbo.t_logistics_dossier_customer f on u.customerID = f.id order by u.contractNO desc
select count(*) from mccdesign.dbo.t_logistics_contract where id!=#{id} and contractNO=#{contractNO}
